doc.title: Taste The Best: Food Photography Workshop and Exhibition!
doc.text: Registration/DT now/RB open/JJ for/IN our/PRP$ next/JJ Food/NN Photography/NN workshop/NN !/. Details/JJ at/IN the/DT end/NN of/IN the/DT post/NN !/. I/PRP am/VBP very/RB excited/JJ to/TO tell/VB you/PRP about/IN my/PRP$ upcoming/NN Food/NN Photography/NN exhibition/NN which/WDT will/VB be/VB happening/VBD on/IN 16/NN to/TO 24/VB February/NN at/IN the/DT main/JJ atrium/NN of/IN Millenia/NN Walk/NN !/. The/DT exhibition/NN will/MD showcase/VB some/NN of/IN my/PRP$ photos/NNS taken/VBN at/IN restaurants/NN and/CC hawker/NN centres/NN which/WRB I/PRP have/VBP specially/RB chosen/VBN to/TO demonstrate/VB some/NN of/IN the/DT techniques/NN that/IN I/PRP have/VBP developed/VBN over/IN the/DT years/NNS for/IN taking/VBG the/DT photos/NNS for/IN this/DT blog/NN ./. Food/NNP photography/NNP has/VBZ been/VBN an/DT area/NN of/IN photography/NN that/WDT has/VBZ been/VBN reserved/NN for/IN professionals/NN until/IN quite/RB recently/RB ./. The/DT confluence/NN smartphones/NN and/CC the/DT social/JJ media/NN in/IN last/JJ decade/NN has/VBZ empowered/JJ millions/NN of/IN foodies/NNS from/IN around/IN the/DT world/NN with/IN the/DT ability/NN to/TO share/VB photos/NNS of/IN what/WP they/PRP have/VBP eaten/VBN with/IN their/PRP$ friends/NNS ala/NN minute/NN ./. food/NN photography/NN ,/, none/NN has/VBZ been/VBN written/VBG about/IN the/DT kind/NN of/IN photos/NNS that/IN millions/NN of/IN foodies/NNS around/IN the/DT world/NN take/VB everyday/NN ./. This/DT is/VBZ a/DT genre/NN of/IN photography/NN that/WDT is/VBZ slowly/RB gaining/VBG recognition/NN and/CC I/PRP hope/VBD that/IN this/DT exhibition/NN will/MD help/VB to/TO bring/VB it/PRP to/TO the/DT next/JJ level/NN ./. This/DT is/VBZ also/RB a/DT chance/NN for/IN us/PRP to/TO celebrate/VB Singapore/NNP 's/POS hawker/NN cuisine/NN ./. Most/JJS food/NN photography/NN focuses/NN on/IN intricately/NNP plated/NNP gourmet/NNP dishes/NNS ./. I/PRP want/VB to/TO show/VB that/WDT our/PRP$ humble/JJ hawker/NN dishes/NNS can/MD be/VB as/IN beautiful/JJ as/IN well/RB ./. For/IN this/DT exhibition/NN ,/, I/PRP have/VBP commissioned/VBN special/JJ teaching/NN aids/NN in/IN the/DT form/NN of/IN food/NN dioramas/NN which/WDT will/VB be/VB on/IN display/VB ./. These/DT dioramas/NN of/IN Singapore/NNP food/NN are/VBP possibly/VBN a/DT world/NN 's/POS first/JJ and/CC we/PRP will/VB be/VB featuring/JJ dim/NNP sum/NNP ,/, kaya/NNP toast/NNP and/CC bak/NNP kut/NNP teh/NNP sets/NNS ./. As/IN teaching/NN aids/NN ,/, they/PRP allow/VBP us/PRP to/TO explore/VB how/RB the/DT direction/NN of/IN light/JJ and/CC camera/JJ settings/NN can/MD affect/VB the/DT final/JJ result/NN of/IN the/DT photo/NN ./. You/PRP will/VB be/VB able/JJ test/IN your/PRP$ camera/NN skills/VBD by/IN trying/VBG to/TO replicate/VB the/DT photos/NNS which/WRB I/PRP have/VBP taken/VBN of/IN the/DT models/NN ./. There/EX will/MD also/RB be/VB an/DT ongoing/JJ food/NN photography/NN competition/NN where/WRB you/PRP can/MD win/NN attractive/NN prizes/NN ./. All/PDT you/PRP need/VB to/TO do/VB is/VBZ to/TO snap/VB a/DT photo/NN ,/, get/VB it/PRP printed/RB at/IN the/DT printing/NN booth/NN and/CC submit/VB it/PRP to/TO join/VB the/DT contest/NN !/. I/PRP will/VB be/VB conducting/JJ two/CD Saturday/NN afternoon/NN workshops/NN on/IN 16th/NN and/CC 23rd/NN where/WRB I/PRP will/MD give/VB a/DT talk/VB about/IN food/NN photography/NN followed/VBD by/IN a/DT hands/NN on/IN workshop/NN ./. Everyone/PRP is/VBZ welcome/JJ to/TO attend/VB regardless/NN of/IN race/NN ,/, language/NN ,/, religion/NN or/CC camera/NN brand/NN !/. Details/JJ and/CC signup/JJ here/RB :/: Workshop/NNP on/IN 16/NNP Feb/NNP Workshop/NN on/IN 23/JJ Feb/NN As/IN far/JJ as/IN I/PRP know/VBP ,/, this/PRP will/MD be/VB the/DT first/JJ time/NN that/WDT such/JJ an/DT exhibition/NN will/MD be/VB held/VBD in/IN Singapore/NNP !/.
